profile:
MICO Restoration is a Disaster Restoration and Environmental Abatement company, servicing the Greater Ottawa Area, with over 30 years of experiences in the followings fields:

- Water/Flood Damage Restoration
- Fire and Smoke Restoration
- Mould/Asbestos Abatement
- Trauma/Crime Scene Cleanup.

All of our technicians are IICRC Certified, as well as holding certifications through the MTCU for Asbestos Abatement.

Contact us today for a free estimate at 613-951-7111.
name: MICO Restoration Inc

profile:
With over 25 years experience as a general contractor, Kevin Collins and his team at Colcon Restorations have become trusted experts for restoration, remediation, and construction services in the greater Ottawa area. Colcon Restorations are restoration contractors that insurance brokers, homeowners and business owners call when there has been water, storm, fire, hail or wind damage that requires clean-up and property repair.
 In addition to emergency restoration services, Colcon also offers demolition services, asbestos removal, mould remediation/removal, lead abatement, hazardous waste removal, renovations and new construction.
Providing residential and commercial contractor services across Eastern Ontario, with majority of clients in Ottawa, Osgoode, Manotick, Greely, Metcalfe, North Dundas, North Grenville and South Dundas.
Call Kevin at 613-229-1216 to request an estimate.
services: General Contracting - framing / doors /windows / siding /flooring / bathrooms / cement finishing /abatement
name: Colcon Restorations Corp
